**End User**

### Notice Description

Polar Knowledge Canada has released a request for proposal for the fabrication and supply of one 8.5-metre, hull inflatable boat with trailer and closed cabin on two outboard engines. This tenders entails a boat designed to offer stability in rough and choppy seas, which will be used for scientific diving operations and extend the range of providing a safety support vessel for research in the high Arctic.

Tenders must be submitted by September 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET. Bids submitted after this date and time are considered non-responsive.

Please note that Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time is disregarded and will be considered as RS Fed procurement. Respondents are expected to follow the CFIA/Industry Rotation policy, unless the specifications or QA/QR policy already mentioned in RFPIXOM not conform with the policy.
